Search input

Search input with AngularJS

Angular notes

The .glyphicon-remove icon is only shown when the search model equates to a value.

Clicking on the .glyphicon-remove icon resets the search model's value to an empty string.

Accessibility notes

Add ng-keydown="" sharing the same function as ng-click="" in order to support keyboard accessibility.
